data.title: List of Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners (1969
data.meta_description: Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners: Dadasaheb Phalke Award is India's largest laurel in cinema. Check the Dadasaheb Phalke award winners list 2022, 2021, and 2020.
data.text:
Dadasaheb Phalke Award winners receive recognition annually during the National Film Awards (NFA) event by the Directorate of Film Festivals, an institution formed by the Ministry of Information and Broadcasting. The Dadasaheb Phalke Award is India’s largest laurel in cinema. A committee of prominent Indian movie industry figures selects the laureate for their “significant contribution to the evolution and advancement of Indian cinema.” In this article, we have mentioned all the Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners from 1969 to 2023.

The award was first presented in 1969 by the Indian Government to honor Dadasaheb Phalke’s contribution to Indian film. Phalke (1870–1944), also known as “the Father of Indian Painting,” was a painter in India who lived from 1870 to 1944. Dadasaheb Phalke award winners are given in the form of a Swarna Kamal (Golden Lotus) medallion, a shawl, and a cash prize of ₹1,000,000.

What is Dadasaheb Phalke Award?

The Dadasaheb Phalke Award is the highest honor in Indian cinema and is presented annually by the Government of India. The award recognizes outstanding contributions to the Indian film industry and is conferred upon individuals for their lifetime achievements in cinema.

Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners List PDF

The Dadasaheb Phalke Award was first presented in 1969 and has since become a prestigious recognition in the Indian film fraternity. Recipients of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award are selected by a committee appointed by the Government of India. The award consists of a Swarna Kamal (Golden Lotus) medallion, a shawl, and a cash prize.

History of Dadasaheb Phalke Award

The Dadasaheb Phalke Award, named after Dhundiraj Govind Phalke, popularly known as Dadasaheb Phalke, has a rich history in the Indian film industry. Here is a brief overview of its history:

The idea of instituting an award to honor exceptional contributions to Indian cinema was conceived in 1969 by the Government of India, coinciding with the birth centenary celebrations of Dadasaheb Phalke, who is considered the father of Indian cinema.

The inaugural Dadasaheb Phalke Award was presented in the same year to actress Devika Rani, recognizing her immense contributions to Indian cinema.

Over the years, it has celebrated the achievements and contributions of legendary personalities in various fields of cinema, including acting, directing, producing, music composition, and more.

The selection process for the award involves a committee appointed by the Government of India, which carefully evaluates the contributions and impact of individuals on Indian cinema.

The award continues to be presented each year, with each recipient adding to the illustrious history of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award and further cementing their place in the annals of Indian cinema.

About Dadasaheb Phalke

Dadasaheb Phalke was a producer, director, and screenwriter who directed Raja Harishchandra, India’s first feature-length film, in 1913. During his 19-year career, he made 95 feature-length films and 27 short films. These are some of his notable films:

Mohini Bhasmasur (1913)

Satyavan Savitri (1914)

Lanka Dahan (1917)

Shri Krishna Janma (1918)

Kaliya Mardan (1919)

Dadasaheb Phalke Award 2023

Dadasaheb Phalke Award winners were announced on 21 February 2023. So, the aspirants preparing for the upcoming UPSC exam must know the award winners of 2022, and direct questions can be asked on this topic. Below we will be covering the Dadasaheb Phalke Award winners for the year 2022.

Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners 2023 Best Actor Ranbir Kapoor for Brahmastra: Part 1 Best Actress Alia Bhatt for Gangubai Kathiawadi Film of The Year RRR Most Promising Actor Rishab Shetty for Kantara Television Series of The Year Anupamaa Most Versatile Actor Of The Year Anupam Kher for The Kashmir Files Best Actress In A Television Series Tejasswi Prakash for Naagin Best Male Singer Sachet Tandon for Maiyya Mainu Best Female Singer Neeti Mohan for Meri Jaan

List of Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners Year-Wise

Rajinikanth won the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2019 and got awarded in 2021, whereas Asha Parekh won this award in 2020 but will receive it in 2022 due to the COVID pandemic. Below is the Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners list with Ceremonial Year, Recipient, and Film Industry.

Dadasaheb Phalke Award 2022

Have a look at the Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners list 2022 was conducted on February 20 at Taj Lands End in Mumbai. The event marked the magnificence of Indian Cinema and celebrated Azadi ka Amrit Mahotsav or 75 years of Independence.

Serial Number 68th Dadasaheb Phalke award Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners 1 Television Series of the Year Anupama 2 Critics Best Actress Kiara Advani for Shershaah 3 Best Actor in Supporting Role Satish Kaushik for Kaagaz 4 Best Debut Ahan Shetty for Tadap 5 Best Playback Singer Female Kanika Kapoor 6 Best Actress in online web series Raveena Tandon for the series Aranyak 7 Critics Best Film Sardar Udham 8 Best Playback Singer Male Vishal Mishra 9 Best Actor in Web Series Manoj Bajpayee for The Family Man 2 10 People’s Choice Best Actress Radhika Madan 11 Best Actress in Supporting Role Lara Dutta for Bell Bottom 12 Excellent Film Industry Contribution Asha Parekh 13 Best Short Film Pauli 14 Best Cinematographer Jayakrishna Gummadi for Haseen Dilruba 15 International Best Feature Film Another Round 16 Best Director Ken Ghosh for State of Siege: Temple Attack 17 Best Actor in a Negative Part Aayush Sharma for Antim: The Final Truth 18 Best Web Series Candy 19 Most Promising Actress in Television Series Rupali Ganguly for Anupama 20 Most Promising Actor in Television Series Dheeraj Dhoopar for Kundali Bhagya 21 People’s Choice Best Actor Abhimanyu Dassani 22 Best Actor in Television Series Shaheer Sheikh from Kuch Rang Pyar ke Aise Bhi 23 Critics Best Actor Sidharth Malhotra for Shershaah 24 Film of the Year Pushpa: The Rise 25 Television Series – Best Actress Shraddha Arya for Kundali Bhagya 26 Best Film Shershaah 27 Best Actress Kriti Sanon for ‘Mimi’ 28 Best Actor Ranveer Singh for ’83’

Dadasaheb Phalke Award 2021

Below are the Dadasaheb Phalke Award winners in 2021. It took place in Mumbai and was showcased live on ZEE5. These Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners are decided by a committee consisting of notable personalities from the Indian film industry.

Award Name Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners Remarkable Contribution to Cinema in the field of Indian Literature Chetan Bhagat Excellent Contribution to Film Industry Dharmendra Performer of the Year Nora Fatehi Best Actor in Television Series Dheeraj Dhoopar Best Actress in Television Series Surbhi Chandna Style Diva of the Year Divya Khosla Kumar Photographer of the Year Daboo Ratnani Best Television Series Kundali Bhagya Album of the Year Titliyaan Best Web Series Scam: 1992 Best Actress (Web Series) Sushmita Sen, Aarya Best Actor (Web Series) Bobby Deol, Aashram Best Actor in Comic Role Kunal Kemmu, Lootcase Best Actress in Supporting Role Radhika Madan Best Actor in a Supporting Role Vikrant Massey, Chhapaak Best Director Anurag Basu, Ludo Most Versatile Actor Kay Kay Menon Top International Feature Film Parasite Best Film Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior Critic’s Best Actor Sushant Singh Rajput Critic’s Best Actress Kiara Advani, Guilty Best Actor (Male) Akshay Kumar, Laxmii Best Actor (Female) Deepika Padukone, Chhapaak

List of Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners 2020

Have a look at the 2020 Dadasaheb Phalke Award winner list given below. In memory of the Father of Indian Cinema, Dadasaheb Phalke, the Indian Government introduced the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 1969.

Award Dadasaheb Phalke Award Winners Most Favourite Jodi in Television Series Sriti Jha and Shabbir Ahluwalia (Kumkum Bhagya) Best Actor in Television Series Dheeraj Dhoopar Best Reality Show Bigg Boss 13 Most Favourite Television Actor Harshad Chopda Best Playback Singer Male Armaan Malik Best Actress in Television Divyanka Tripathi Best Television Series Kumkum Bhagya Best Actor Hrithik Roshan (Super 30) Best Film Super 30 Most Promising Actor Kiccha Sudeep

Dadasaheb Phalke Award UPSC

The relevance of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in UPSC can be found under the “important facts for the Prelims” section. Dadasaheb Phalke Award is the highest honor in Indian cinema, named after the visionary filmmaker Dadasaheb Phalke, who is considered the father of Indian cinema. In the past, many questions have been asked related to this Dadasaheb Phalke Award, which makes it one of the most important topics that an aspirant shouldn’t miss during UPSC Prelims exam preparation.

Dadasaheb Phalke Award MCQs

Question: The Dadasaheb Phalke Award is presented in which field? a) Literature b) Music c) Film d) Sports

Answer: c) Film

Question: Who was the first recipient of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award? a) Prithviraj Kapoor b) Devika Rani c) Ashok Kumar d) B. N. Sircar

Answer: b) Devika Rani

Question: Which of the following is considered the highest honor in Indian cinema? a) Filmfare Award b) National Film Award c) Dadasaheb Phalke Award d) IIFA Award

Answer: c) Dadasaheb Phalke Award
